title: Part 2: Gavin Rossdale + News (ACS October 27)
itunes:title: Part 2: Gavin Rossdale + News (ACS October 27)
description:
The lead singer of Bush, Gavin Rossdale, talks to Adam about their new album, ‘The Art of Survival’. The two reminisce about KROQ and take a dive into the songs of Leonard Cohen before Gavin explains he’s worried his kids might not think he’s cool. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the man who drove an SUV into a Christmas parade being found guilty and an airline launching a lottery to entice more passengers to sit in the middle seat.

PLUGS:

Download or stream Bush’s new album, ‘The Art of Survival’  wherever you find music

To see Bush live, visit BushOfficial.com to see upcoming tour dates

Watch Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s documentary ‘The Real Anthony Fauci’ at TheRealAnthonyFauciMovie.com

And follow him on Twitter, @RobertKennedyJr

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

Stamps.com enter ADAM

Geico.com
